Apple 零点击 iMessage 漏洞利用间谍软件感染 iPhone https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/apple-zero-click-imessage-exploit-used-to-infect-iphones-with-spyware/ Thu, 07 Sep 2023 16:18:23 -0400塞尔吉乌·加特兰SecurityApple https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/apple-zero-click-imessage-exploit-used-to-infect-iphones-with-spyware/ Citizen Lab says two zero-days fixed by Apple today in emergency security updates were actively abused as part of a zero-click exploit chain to deploy NSO Group's Pegasus commercial spyware onto fully patched iPhones.
